name: Ethylene phthalate polymers identified in 21 CFR 177.1630(e)(4)(i) and 177.1630(e)(4)(ii), items 2 and 3, 177.1637 and FCN numbers 4, 13, 14, and 135 modified with 1,2,4,5-benzenetetracarboxylic dianhydride (pyromellitic dianhydride (PMDA))
FoodContactSubstance: Ethylene phthalate polymers identified in 21 CFR 177.1630(e)(4)(i) and 177.1630(e)(4)(ii), items 2 and 3, 177.1637 and FCN numbers 4, 13, 14, and 135 modified with 1,2,4,5-benzenetetracarboxylic dianhydride (pyromellitic dianhydride (PMDA)) (CAS Reg. No. 89-32-7).
